sub_topic: Determining the volume of a sphere.
message_1: What is the volume of a sphere with a radius of 7 cm?
message_2:
The volume V of a sphere can be calculated using the formula:

V = (4/3)πr³

where r is the radius of the sphere.

Given the radius r = 7 cm, we can calculate the volume as follows:

V = (4/3)π(7³)
V = (4/3)π(343)
V = 4 * 343π / 3
V ≈ 1436.03 cm³

The volume of the sphere with a radius of 7 cm is approximately 1436.03 cubic centimeters.
